name: 01 Taunt Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sheer..Key Notes: Bergamot, Vanilla, Amber..Fragrance Description: Your sweet side, bottled. Embrace your own uniqueness with Taunt – a fan-favorite best selling DedCool scent that smells insanely good on everybody. Taunt all the time with our newly intensified wear-power...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Extracts of Borago Officinals (Borage), Sambucus Nigra (Elder) Flower Extract, Camellia Sinesis (White Tea) Leaf Extract, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Extract, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Extract, Althaea Officinalis (Marshmallow) Root Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit (Rose Hip) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Panax (Ginseng) Root Extract, Illex Paraguensis Leaf (Yerba Mate) Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus (Bladderwrack) (Seaweed) Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Extract, and Porphyra Yezoensis (Seaweed) Extract, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Cinnamal, Linalool...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 ml eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_title: Be prepared to talk to strangers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of those scents that follows you around. Strangers stop you to ask what perfume you are wearing. My husband kept walking around the house asking what is that smell? Not overpowering. No chemical smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had bought the laundry detergent and really liked it so I bought this expecting it to smell the same and where the detergent is almost a dark musky lemon smell this one is kind of just lemon..? There is a little more to the smell of course but it’s less gender neutral than I was hoping

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the freshest, most subtle beauty. A little citrus, a little sweet, mostly a fresh, clean girl scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you spray this perfume, the first impression is spectacular. The scent has volume and depth, with nuanced layers and a lot of character. However, once it dries down after the initial five to ten minutes, the scent becomes monotone, incredibly flat, and loses its sparkle. Its performance is also rather short-lived.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample and like many others noted, it’s very heavy on the vanilla! This took me back to the early 2000’s walking into a Hollister store. Iykyk. I don’t hate it but I don’t love it either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like warm vanilla sugar from b&bb imo. Very vanilla heavy. I don’t smell any other notes. Thought it would have more complexity. Not really my cup of tea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do you know how hard it is to find your signature scent? My fragrance collection consists of over 80 bottles! And DedCool Taunt has become my number one, as it's aptly named fragrance number 01. I just can't get enough of it! I need a gallon of Taunt to pour all over my body day and night. That's how obsessed I am with it. I will treasure it like the apple of my eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect fresh summer scent for me! My new favorite. This scent evokes wonderful memories.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful vanilla on me. I love it. It’s light enough for daytime but can be worn night time too it’s sexy cozy flirty and warm without being to sickly sweet or heavy . It’s balanced well. It reminds me of sweet cereal and I’m ok with that love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like a cheap, low quality perfume you'd buy from the dollar store. This was a blind purchase based off description and reviews, will 100% return. Maybe something I'd wear when I was in middle school.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best gender neutral smell, fresh and clean and still warm
Literally one of my favs perfumes and scents. Every time I wear this I get so many compliments I’ve gotten 3 of my friends to buy a bottle too! Perfect day time scent and even at night! Obsessed!
I never write reviews but I’m obsessed with this perfume! Originally thought i wanted milk or extra milk but taunt is my go to it’s so so amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tested Ded cool Fragrance 01 Taunt for 5 days, hoping to find a fresh everyday summer scent. The first thing I noticed was the packaging. The box has a nice, smooth texture that feels luxurious. The bottle itself is pretty standard, but it serves its purpose. The scent was everything I was looking for. It’s incredibly refreshing and adapts well to different body chemistries. When I applied it, the fragrance leaned towards a floral note, while on my boyfriend, it had a sweeter essence. It’s truly genderless. The scent is clean and refreshing, making it great for an everyday fragrance. It has a subtle vanilla note to it, which kinda acts like an afterthought. This gives a light sweetness without being overpowering, making it perfect for me. I typically gravitate towards vanilla scents in winter but prefer something less sweet and warm during the summer. However, it didn’t last. Both my boyfriend and I did a 24-hour wear test, and we found that the scent didn’t last beyond six hours. Given this, I wouldn’t rely on this perfume to keep you smelling fresh throughout an entire day. Instead, it’s better for a short outing or as a scent before bed. Overall, the Ded cool Fragrance 01 Taunt has a delightful and adaptable fragrance. It can be great for layering scents, or as an everyday scent for lounging at home or for short periods.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are not many things I can say that I do everyday systematically, but one of the things I do religiously everyday is put on perfume. I have been using perfume since I was little, my mom always told me to smell good and never be known as the stinky one. I have a large perfume collection. For me it’s a big pick me up and really sets my mood. I love that there are so many choices available for everyone. I have to say that Dedcool is a newer brand that really has stepped out of the box with wonderful scents that are genderless. But most importantly Dedcoom makes nontoxic products. It used organic and certified vegan ingredients in their genderless fragrances. The fragrance 01 “Taunt” is one of my all time fragrances I own and use. The fragrance has some beautiful top notes like bergamot and fresh dew, middle notes of floral and cassis and the bottom notes are vanilla and amber, even if you are not an notes expert all you need to know is that this fragrance is amazing. The fragrance has a medium strength so it does not give off a super stinky scent. This fragrance makes me feel sexy and empowered thanks to the amber note.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I started using it since a week and its a really nice smell with Vanilla and Amber. Making it pretty spicey and warm. Im not a really big fan of warm smells and dont really use spicey perfumes but I really like this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this as a blind buy based on the amazing reviews it received on many websites and it did not disappoint! It is SO GOOD -- fresh, soft, warm, sweet, comforting...like a hug! It's perfect for all seasons, honestly. Definitely a safe office and healthcare profession perfume. I'm already planning on purchasing the large bottle because I know I will be wearing this perfume ALL the time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm new to fragrances and was excited to try out Taunt because the combination of sparkling citrus and vanilla sounded intriguing to me.  I'm not a fan of artificial vanilla scents, like Warm Vanilla Sugar makes me nauseous, and thankfully this was not artificial.  However, it's definitely vanilla heavy.  I wanted to smell more of the citrus, but unfortunately it gets lost in all the vanilla; I smelled it once when I first sprayed it, then the vanilla takes over.  The brand described it as an ice cream date and that's pretty much what it smells like: melted vanilla ice cream.  Because it's so vanilla heavy I wouldn't really call it a genderless fragrance, since vanilla is much more associated as a feminine scent.  I think if it were more balanced with the citrus it could give more genderless.  The strength is definitely medium.  My sister has a sensitive nose and didn't comment on it, actually no one really commented on it.  It also didn't last all day, but definitely long enough.  I haven't tried layering it, so I'd like to try doing that with a citrus scent and seeing how that goes.  Also a word of caution: the website says to spray on skin and clothes, the packaging says to spray on skin; I say to spray on skin since it definitely has oil in it and you don't want to mess up certain fabrics.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Taunt by DedCool is a truly genderless scent composition coupling delicious and warm vanilla with the woodsy musk of amber. The blend is further balanced by the light citrus and spicy profile of bergamot. I really love the universality of this fragrance and find it has a very comforting, lived in feel when I wear it and immediately syncs with skin’s chemistry. Spray a slip of paper with Taunt after applying to your skin and a few minutes later, note how different the two scent surfaces are. There is a fast fade on this parfum, and if you appreciate a more subtle wear in fragrance this may be perfect. If you prefer a stronger sillage or more permanent wear you may need a layered application to help it last or a refresh spray at some point in the day. Overall Taunt is truly a universal and naturally captivating scent that would work well on anyone.

reviews.review_title: A comforting scent that is sure to please
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love DedCool as a brand, and Taunt is my new favorite vanilla fragrance. This genderless perfume is nothing short of yummy- the interplay between its vanilla, amber, and bergamot notes creates a warm and inviting aroma. The vanilla provides a sweet, creamy base that is deliciously balanced by the amber and bergamot, keeping it from becoming overly saccharine or feminine. The vanilla comes through as an inherently rich and comforting scent, softened and enhanced by the bergamot and amber.  The amber adds a layer of warmth and depth, creating a lingering sense of peace and calm, while the bergamot brings a citrusy freshness that complements the richness of the amber and the sweetness of the vanilla. Together, the blend creates a harmony that is both luxurious and serene.  One of my favorite aspects of Taunt is its versatility. It's perfect for any time of the day, even during intense workouts. In fact, it creates an even more delightful scent when it mingles with your sweat. I love spritzing myself with it before my daily run… I smell good even when I'm sweating like crazy. There's something about the way the fragrance evolves with my body heat that I love. And after a long and luxurious shower, I love layering it with other fragrances depending on my mood… it’s an act of self-care that I look forward to. I even find myself taking whiffs of my wrists when I’m stressed out because the scent calms me and makes me feel content.  The boyfriend also can't get enough of it. He loves snuggling up to me and inhaling the scent from my neck when we’re Netflix and chilling. It smells amazing but slightly different on him- unfortunately for him, I warned him to keep his hands off… it’s all mine.   The cool, young, and hip design of the bottle, with its signature bar code, makes it stand out from my other fragrances. It reminds me that fragrance is meant to be playful and fun.   I recommend this to anyone looking for a scent that is both versatile and fun. Its genderless appeal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a diehard Beauty Enthusiast with a love and passion for fragrance. I am so infatuated with Dedcool's Taunt. This dreamy scent is the absolute warmest embrace on a cool Autumn day. I pick up heavily on the amber and vanilla notes of this EDP and can feel them encapsulate me as I spritz them on. This is my first experience with the brand Dedcool and I am a huge fan. Their minimalistic packaging really leaves you to appreciate the beauty of the fragrance itself. I love the sleek, clear glass bottle with its fine black text and unique barcode. Their atomizer on the bottle provides a burst of this perfect, even mist. I love that this fragrance it's genderless and vegan. Both my husband and I really appreciated the scent and we're able to uniquely adorn it.

reviews.review_title: Very beautiful scent and simple packaging!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a beauty enthusiast for five years and have been blessed with the opportunity of testing and reviewing a variety of products, but this was my first time trying a product from dedcool and let me tell you it did not disappoint. I will say I usually lean more towards citrus and musk types of scents, but I do have a love in my heart for a warm vanilla and floral scent like this one every now and then. The packaging is very simple and minimalistic as it comes in a glass bottle with a metal nozzle and elegant bar code design that features the name of the perfume underneath that which I absolutely love. When I first apply it to my skin, the vanilla takes center stage, filling my senses full of richy sweet scent notes that I find to be super peaceful and calming, but over time, this fragrance transforms and settles into a floraly bergamot scent with slight hints of warm and powdery amber that I find to be soothing, stress reducing and very cosy like wrapping myself in a cashmere sweater. I think the scent notes in this fragrance work so perfectly together, but I can't lie, I was expecting it to be a little citrusy due to the bergamot, but I was so wrong. I also don't find it to have much longevity as I can't tell I applied it within about four hours and I also don't think it's a genderless fragrance as it's just to sweet and floraly. Overall, I really like this scent and how it works with my body chemistry and will definitely purchase it again even though it doesn't last that long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After hearing the notes in Dedcool’s Fragrance 01 “Taunt” I knew that I was going to love it. The top notes of bergamot and fresh dew give a fresh burst during the beginning of the fragrance. I find the combination of citrus and floral notes give off a clean, crisp aroma. The middle notes of floral and cassis give off a floral yet fruity aroma that brings the perfect amount of sweetness to the perfume. The base notes of vanilla and amber are what really made me fall in love with Taunt. The combination of these two truly give a warm and cozy finish to this incredible perfume. Dedcool has created a scent that seems so familiar to my senses, every time I smell it I get a sensation of feeling at home. This perfume is perfect for any occasion, it’s not overwhelming by any means which can make it a perfect scent for a work environment. It has the perfect staying-power for me as well. I have worn this for 8+ hours and could still smell it on my skin when I came home. I can confidently say that I will be wearing this quite often!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so good it’s amazing. Of course the smells of perfumes are up to peoples preference but this perfume is just it! Furthermore, the perfume is very strong which I like since I know it will last very long usually perfumes don’t last long on me so I love this perfume becuase of that feature. This perfume is for me because I love vanilla smells and perfume has vanilla in it, which I just love. That’s why when I first smelt it I knew I was gonna love it right off the bat and use it every other day. However, it’s not an every day smell because it is very strong. I do believe it’s gender neutral since it doesn’t smell like it’s for a boy or a girl However, this perfume is just it and is going into my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool’s 01 Taunt opens with sweetness and citrus. It’s a light scent, not syrupy. It smells crisp and springy. The vanilla notes are also crisp, more like grains of sugar between my teeth than the waft of warm baked goods. It’s interestingly not so much a gourmand scent despite the vanilla notes, as it’s balanced with florals and resolves to a delicate powderiness.   Though it’s advertised as genderless, and I believe that most things are (anyone can wear a dress; clothes don’t have a gender), this fragrance is more on the feminine side with its sweetness and floral bouquet. I don’t find it particularly long-lasting, and it doesn’t seem to grab onto my clothes, which is a shame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this vanilla unisex fragrance. Even my partner borrowed some because they liked it! The scent is musky and slightly sweet to me. I liked how the sweetness isn't too feminine or overpowering. If you enjoy white florals and a clean musk scent, this is the fragrance for you! I liked how this clean and vegan scent didn't irritate my skin either. I have sensitive skin and sometimes get rashes from certain fragrances! The scent lasts a long time on me too so I think this bottle will last me a while. I'd reccomend this fragrance if you're looking for a simple and affordable product. This scent is simple enough that it can layer well with other fragrances! I really enjoyed layering this product with some floral perfumes that I own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is my first experience with Dedcool, and I instantly knew it was what I’d been searching for! It quickly became a staple in my daily routine. The scent is creamy, warm, and spicy, with a medium strength and long-lasting wear that lingers on clothes for days. The top notes are Bergamot and fresh dew, the middle notes are Floral and Cassis, and the base notes are vanilla and amber. Suitable for all seasons, it adjusts perfectly depending on how much you apply. The uniquely captivating scent always draws compliments. Plus, it’s 100% vegan and organic with clean ingredients. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a lover of fragrance with no specific preference for the type or notes. I like to match my fragrance for the specific occasions.  The DedCool 01 Taunt fragrance at first spray reminded me of high school summer days. The first note that I smell is fresh dew, leading into a light hint of floral, then it quickly softens to a spicy vanilla.  Most vanilla scented fragrances are too sweet for me and often gives me headaches. The vanilla in the 01 Taunt melts into my skin and leaves a subtle tinge of sweetness.  This fragrance doesn't wear very long on my skin so I like to wear it to bed with a body butter that enchanted the scent.  Anytime I leave my home, I like to spray on a fragrance and because this scent is so light, I can spray this on before running errands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent profile is composed of top notes of bergamot and fresh dew, middle notes of floral and cassis, and base notes of vanilla and amber. This combination creates a light yet intriguing fragrance that many find both alluring and comforting. The fragrance is also noted for being genderless and vegan, appealing to a broad audience who appreciate eco-friendly and inclusive products. Its long-lasting formula ensures the scent stays on the skin throughout the day, making it a reliable choice for daily wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I spend most of my time during the day interacting with clients and colleages, and smelling good is one of my top priority to feel fresh. When I checked DedCool Taunt Perfume and as it has vanilla based fragrance, I was sure this perfume would be a good fit for me and super excited to try it out. I was not wrong at all and loved the fragrance notes of this perfume. It has medium fragrance that is perfect for every day wear. It has a mix of warm and spicy scent of Amber and Vanilla. It also has a note of bergamot to give the fresh and soothing feel to this perfume. One of the best feature is the perfume is 100% vegan and organic. Moreover, it is made in USA ensuring high quality. The packaging and the perfume bottle have an appealing and premium design. This perfume is definitely a nice addition to my perfume collection. As this perfume is genderless, I highly recommend it to everyone looking for a sweet and spicy mix daily wear perfume and I am sure you will like it.

reviews.review_title: Genderless fragrance concept is dead cool!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.  As a hairstylist, makeup artist and content creator, I like things that look and smell good, so I was so excited to be introduced to this brand. I absolutely *love* the concept of a genderless fragrance. Why? Because I'm the one who walks up to fragrance counters and douses myself with men's cologne. I don't want to stay in my lane when it comes to perfume - I'm all about the unisex fragrance. Remember Ck One by Calvin Klein? That's not what this scent reminds me of, but that's what Dedcool's concept reminds me of. Dead cool, right?   I'll be honest, the scent Taunt didn't do it for me. I'm more of a citrus or musk fan, and I'm not sure if it was the vanilla or amber that felt a little sweet for my palette (but I love bergamot, which is in here); but I'm giving it 4 stars because I feel like just because this particular blend didn't mesh with me, I know they have something else I'd like. And I think their idea for genderless fragrance is brilliant. This means you can buy this for someone as a cool gift and do it based off notes, not whether it's a cologne or perfume. Also, all was not lost because I ended up layering this with my other perfume I normally wear, and it paired really well. I think that's what's neat about this brand - you can layer it. You don't have to alternate it with your regular, tried-and-true perfume or cologne. Just layer.   Great brand, great quality, and I will definitely be on the lookout for their more lemony or musk-based scents. Glad they're on my radar now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I read the scent notes for DedCool’s Taunt perfume, I had a feeling I would like it, and I was correct. So if you tend to go for warm, sensual vanilla-based perfumes, this might be for you. It features notes of vanilla, amber, and bergamot. It’s a bit of a medium scent - not too heavy at all, but you can definitely tell you’re wearing something, though I do find it fades if trying to wear it all day. Something that is cool with DedCool perfumes is that they are designed with the potential to be layered with other scents. I love wearing Taunt on its own, but I have also tried it layered with DedCool’s layering scents Milk and Xtra Milk. It smells a little different with each but still great, giving you three unique smells and ways to wear it. DedCool also prides itself on most of their scents being genderless. I think that is largely true; however, I would say that Taunt leans more feminine-smelling to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with Taunt at first whiff, it carries some of the same notes as their XtraMilk but that Vanilla packs a punch, I smell downright edible. It smells like a warm summer morning: light citrus sweetness with a heavy powdery feel. That Bergamot invigorates the senses but it's almost as if you were lured awake. I wished that note could have bloomed a little more though. It's a nice level beyond a skin scent, making it easy to layer, but remains light and natural. I layered this scent with Maison Louise Marie No.14 which just added the perfect touch of sexy dark floral. I still prefer to wear it alone especially in the mornings as it doesn't trigger any headaches for me. It remains niche and unique enough that it leaves an impression. The Vanilla Amber notes reminds me of Maison Margiela's By the Fireplace. When I first smelled this scent, it reminded me of clouds because you feel warm and soft. I could see this scent pairing really well with oud or woody scents making it a year-round staple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 45 year old female who just began her fragrance journey and I have come to absolutely love the Dedcool fragrance. When I first tried their discovery set I instantly fell in love with Taunt and I mean INSTANTLY!! This scent reminds being at the beach at night with a bonfire because it’s a clean, warm scent to me and I just can’t think of a better way to describe how it makes me feel.  The key notes of Bergamot, Vanilla, Amber and honestly notes that always attract me so it is no surprise that I love this. While I love wearing this alone, it lasts far better layered and the best pairing I have found would be to start with Xtra Milk and then top it with Taunt and that is just the crème de la crème.  Seriously, if this has been on your list, I highly think it is worth checking out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. My name is Lyndsey. I am a licensed Cosmetologist of eleven years. While hair is my passion scents are a close runner up for me. This is my second time trying a ded cool fragrance and once again I just have to say it did not disappoint. While the scent was refreshing and unique my favorite feature is the fact that it can be buildable and layered with other fragrance notes very nicely. I focus when applying fragrance behind my ears and on my wrists . And this scent has a long lasting fragrance compared to other scents with the same notes. I love that this scent also pairs fresh with bakery in a sense. The bottle is sleek classy and simple which is exactly what ded cool brings to mind whenever I think about it. I would recommend this scent for anyone who needs something daily or even for a night out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a lover of all things fragrance I am thrilled to be trying DedCool eau de parfum #1. This perfume is comprised of two of my favorite scents, amber and vanilla, both of which come through just beautifully in the fragrance giving it a scent that is both warm and just a little something spicy while the notes of bergamot gives it a lovely fresh addition, making for a scent that is both unique and fun. I also love that this perfume can be layered to make it into something unique only unto myself, I just wish it lasted a little longer. One of the best thing about this brand and this perfume is that the formula is entirely vegan and also certified organic and to top it off, it's made in the USA.  Another thing to mention, this comes in a lovely glass bottle that just looks classy on my dressing table. The scent of this perfume just makes me feel good about myself and I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a scent to be their new signature.   This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying the brand Dedcool, and I am a fragrance junkie. Let me just say, I can’t believe I didn’t try this brand before! Now I can’t wait to try other fragrances and products from them. The sweetness of the vanilla blended with the fresh bergamot and sensual amber created such a lovely scent to the nose. Whether I used this fragrance alone, or layered it with another— I would get whiffs of it throughout the day. Longevity is also something I hope for when trying a new fragrance, so to me this one was a win! And even if I became nose blind to it, I still would receive compliments on it! This fragrance would be perfect for a night out or a sunny outdoor wedding. But just a warning before you purchase—be prepared for random strangers stopping you to say: “what are you wearing? It smells amazing!”  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As an experienced beauty advisor I had nothing but positive things to say about DedCool 01 “Taunt”! This captivating fragrance combines elegance with a hint of boldness but still keeping a fresh clean smell perfect for the summer! The scent opens with a blend of vanilla, amber, and fresh florals, drawing you in from the first spray. This unisex perfume is versatile, perfect for both day and night, making it a great choice for and everyday scent. It lasts long and has a balanced presence that is noticeable but not overpowering at all. The fragrance experience of “Taunt” is warm and sweet with a touch of spice, giving a cozy yet confident feel. For anyone looking for a unique and memorable fragrance, DedCool 01 “Taunt” is a top pick for sure! Its special blend and lasting effect make it a great choice for those wanting to stand out with a signature scent. I highly recommended!   “This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh, where do I even start with Dedcool 01 Taunt? From the moment I unboxed this sleek little bottle, I knew I was in for a treat. The packaging? Minimalist chic with a touch of edginess that screams I’m not your average scent.   Now, let’s get to the good stuff - the smell! Imagine a creamy swirl of vanilla clouds floating through a citrus sky. It’s like daydreaming about your first crush or that perfect summer day that you never wanted to end. Every spritz is a burst of bergamot freshness followed by a warm embrace of amber that just makes me feel… alive. It’s light, it’s playful, and yet there’s a depth to it that’s utterly captivating. Spritzing this on is like flipping your hair in slow motion while the world watches in awe. It’s the vanilla citrus love child that summer flings wish they could be.  Wearing this fragrance is like slipping into a persona that’s confident, a bit mysterious, and totally irresistible. Every time I wear it, I feel like I’m strutting down an invisible runway, leaving a trail of who’s that? in the air. It’s the kind of smell that makes you want to ask me out for coffee just to stay in my scented orbit a little longer.   And because Dedcool is all about that clean, green, vegan scene, I can spritz with abandon, knowing my fabulousness isn’t costing the earth. So here’s to smelling like a dream and living the ecoconscious queen lifestyle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool's Taunt is a gemstone in my scent collection. It starts off with bergamot and fresh dew with the middle notes of cassis and flowers and ends in vanilla and amber. As the notes suggests, this fragrance is warm and spicy. It is unisex and layerable; I loved it on its own, but it's even better layering with my usual scent! Dedcool's mission statement of a functional fragrance brand that makes people feel better through scents makes this fragrance powerful because I feel super cozy whenever I use it: it reminds me of old sunny days. Unfortunately, it did not last long on my skin, but I hope an extract version will be available as well. On the other hand, I loved the clear, simple bottle that sprays just enough. It is sturdy enough to carry it in your purse too!  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Awesome scent that lasts all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I tried Dedcool “Taunt” and I have to say I am literally in love with this scent. I like the idea of clean scent and that it’s suitable for any gender. I’ve been wearing for the last couple of days and and can’t get enough of it. It’s the perfect combination of ingredients that makes it so special and so versatile. The scent lasts all day long on my skin and clothes and is not overpowering at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really, really enjoyed this fragrance by Dedcool. It's No.1 Taunt. It's very versatile. I've worn it by itself and I've layered it with other fragrances. It wore great both ways. This could be enjoyed and worn by men or women. It's a very unisex scent. It has note of bergamot, vanilla and amber. It's a warm, comforting and even sexy scent on It's own. It lasts a good 6 hours or more. I've paired it with just body spray and other perfumes. It gives a great base to other scents, but it stands up well all on It's own, too. I noticed that as I wear it, if I get warm, the scent gets warmer. If I'm inside in the cool air, the lighter notes sing. This is really a solid fragrance that I'll be keeping in my collection from now on. I'm truly impressed by it.  I received this product as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a perfume collector and this is one of those perfumes that you need to have with you.  When I’m wearing this perfume it makes me feel nostalgic but warm and cozy at the same time, it’s like your skin but better fragrance, it’s smells wonderful it’s like a baby scent but for adults. It very warm and inviting, on my skin last between 6-8 hours without reapplying and on the clothes last days! The silage is moderate, I think is more like a personal fragrance.   The mist is another special thing, is very fine and wide so when you’re spraying it you know that you’re covering a lot only with a couple of sprays.   The bottle is very simple and elegant, looks beautiful on my counter top and I’m pleased to have this perfume in my collection. I enjoy wearing this fragrance so much,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am currently in the my phase of exploring different fragrances and this is my 2nd perfume from Dedcool. Love how they create versatile scents that are gender less and easily wearable by anyone. The minimalist packaging and aesthetic look pretty on my vanity shelf. This Taunt scent to me is very soft and not overpowering. On me, it smells fresh and love how it dries down to the beautiful warm vanilla and amber notes. I also feel like the scent story seem to evolve on a light powdery scent. I did not particularly notice the citrus notes which i usually gravitates toward to as well. This is a warm scent that is perfect for everyday wear either by men or women. Dedcool scents are also layerable so I will definitely try layering it next time. Another perfect scent especially this summer time.

reviews.review_title: Vanilla lovers will love this scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool Taunt Eau De Parfum is such a nice addition to my fragrance collection, especially as someone who loves vanilla and bergamot scents. The parfum has a perfect blend of soft and sweet notes that create a warm, inviting aura. With the first spritz, I could sense a light sweetness that is not overpowering; after the initial spritz, the scent transitions to a blend of creamy vanilla and amber. My friends said it has a sexy vanilla scent. After the spritz dries down, Taunt leaves a skin-like musk that lingers for several hours throughout the day. The longevity is okay as it lasts several hours without reapplication, but it definitely does not last the whole day (reason why I took off one star). Love the packaging and how it has the description of the scents. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.   First off, I love trying new scents and I have a perfume obsession and have been so excited to give this scent a try! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello so here is my authentic review for Dedcool taunt this is a great unique scent that is simple and it actually last all day.It smells fresh of bergamot and warm vanilla I also liked the unique packaging.I wore this on Memorial Day and I did receive compliments on this perfume.I like this perfume is unique and it is authentic to itself .If u want to try something different unique then try Dedcool Taunt .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Do you love gourmand scents but struggle to find one that is sophisticated and doesn’t smell like something a tween would wear? Well now the search is over with Taunt by Dedcool!  Taunt opens with the sweet note of vanilla but the addition of bergamot and amber really warms up the overall scent profile and adds a touch of subtle sexiness. It smells like one of those expensive “it girl” niche perfumes but at a surprisingly affordable price point.  The projection and lasting power of Taunt is above average, I can still smell it on myself 4+ hours later. I also love that this is a very layerable scent and I can mix and match it with so many other scents in my collection. I feel like this scent would work for any season which makes this perfume so dynamic and versatile.  I highly recommend adding this to your collection if you want something that is warm, sweet, sexy and sophisticated and can be worn for any occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will be the first to admit I'm a bit picky with fragrances and hard to please. I enjoy trying our a variety of scents but almost always have a few nit picks about them. That being said Taunt blew me out of the water! It's honestly the first fragrance I loved as soon as it spritzed out and hit my nose. The pleasant scent remained as is lasted through the day and I didn't notice a shift in scent besides being a little weaker than when first applied but that's to be expected. I can sometimes be nose blind with amber so I wasn't sure I'd be able to sniff that aspect but I can tell it (along with the bergamot) aid in making the vanilla more warm and sensual. It's not a sickeningly sweet vanilla, more warm and inviting, think house that just baked cookies versus inhaling frosting. If you are on the fence definitely try Dedcool's trial size to see for yourself. Honestly though you'll probably love it!!! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. This fragrance is fantastic and unlike anything else I own or have tried. While this is a warm and spicy scent, it is also very fresh and juicy. I've worn it alone and layered, and it smells great no matter which way you choose to wear it. What I chose to layer it with was a more tropical/summer-forward fragrance; it layered very nicely. The bergamont note is very nice, and it really shines in this fragrance, so if bergamont is something you really enjoy, this would be great for you. Since it is warm and has fresh dew and floral notes, I think you could wear this in any season and on any occasion. Something else to note about 01 Taunt is that it is long-lasting but not overpowering, so you can choose to layer it if you would like to. I also love the spray on it, and the packaging is really unique and beautiful. It is definitely a fragrance that I want to display.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A wonderful scent that lasts all day

reviews.review_title: Love the bergamot and vanilla blend
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool is actually the brand that really catapulted me into the fragrance sector of the beauty world. I have used very limited fragrances because I’m sensitive to certain scents that can become migraine triggering. Yet, this is another fragrance by Dedcool that I absolutely love. I’ve grown very fond of sweet scents and I love the blend of bergamot and vanilla. Most times, floral scents can be triggering for me but as a middle note, it’s a bit masked and not as overpowering. This one reminds me of a white musk scent I used to wear when I was younger. Although it is a layering scent, I do feel that it lasts for a while (compared to other brands) and to my liking, due to my sensitivity at times. But I do enjoy wearing it alone without any other fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Going on my rack dedicated to good fragrances!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance radiates in the air a couple hours after spraying and I love that. It’s soft but presentable and very obsessing. When you first smell it, u want to smell it again and again. Not gonna lie, at first, it smelt like perfect peony from Bath and Body Works, but after you spray it some more, it starts pulling away from that. It smells like that one favorite scented lotion that makes you keep sniffing your hands throughout the day. The first smell you can recognize is that it’s bright and refreshing. The aftersmell is peachy with some vanilla. It’s faint so it won’t give you a headache, but I like that it lasts. I like that it’s small enough to be fit in a purse, but big enough to last u months. The only improvement is packaging; it’s too simple for me, but I’m thinking that’s the brand’s style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fragrance 01 Taunt is a truly exceptional scent that has quickly become one of my all-time favorites. From the moment I first experienced it, I was captivated by its complexity and allure. This exquisite blend of notes creates a fragrance that is both sophisticated and alluring, making it the perfect choice for any occasion.  The top notes of bergamot and fresh dew immediately draw you in with their bright and refreshing aroma. The citrusy and green notes are invigorating and uplifting, creating a sense of freshness that is both energizing and invigorating. These initial scents set the stage for what is to come, creating a captivating and memorable first impression.  As the fragrance begins to settle, the middle notes of floral and cassis emerge, adding a touch of sweetness and femininity to the mix. The floral notes are delicate and romantic, while the cassis adds a juicy and fruity element that adds depth and complexity to the scent. This combination of notes creates a beautiful and harmonious blend that is both captivating and enchanting.  The base notes of vanilla and amber provide a warm and sensual foundation that lingers on the skin long after the initial application. The sweet and creamy vanilla is comforting and inviting, while the amber adds a rich and exotic touch that adds a sense of mystery and intrigue.  One of the things I love most about Fragrance 01 Taunt is its versatility. This fragrance is perfect for both day and evening wear, making it a great choice for any occasion. Whether you're heading to the office or out for a night on the town, this fragrance will leave you feeling confident, elegant, and sophisticated.  The longevity and sillage of Fragrance 01 Taunt are also worth noting. This fragrance has great staying power, lasting for hours on the skin without needing to be reapplied.  Overall, Fragrance 01 Taunt is a masterpiece of a scent that I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a unique and captivating fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a vanilla fragrance lover, I was super excited to try Taunt perfume from Dedcool. It totally fits my vibe. This fragrance is delightful and gives me a vanilla scent, but it is not sugary sweet or overwhelming. It is more like a warm, comforting vanilla bean with a touch of freshness, and the bergamot gives me a cozy feeling. I have gotten many compliments whenever I wear it my friend really seems to love it. I wish it had more longevity, after a couple of hours, the scent fades completely. Not only that, but I always reapply it throughout the day, but something to consider because it gives mist feeling more than perfume in terms of longevity. If you are looking for a fragrance that lasts all day long, this might not be your perfect match. Despite the reapplication factor, I absolutely love this one, and it works beautifully on my skin.  I would love to see how it plays with my other favorite fragrances. This is definitely a perfume worth adding to your collection. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: A must have to smell fantastic!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool fragrance is absolutely amazing! I usually only use one kind of perfume. I've tried others and was never really impressed. However, I am absolutely in love with this fragrance. I have gotten so many compliments on it. It lasts all day. I even use it to freshen the the smell of my hair. It is so thick and never gets greasy so I don't wash it a lot and dry shampoo makes it feel too gritty. I just have to spritz a little bit and I can smell the difference. When I spray it, I can smell it linger all day in my apartment, on my clothes and on me. This fragrance is highly recommended! It almost reminds me of Victoria Secret. I use it everyday. As soon as I get out of the shower I spray it on me and then when I get dressed I spray it on me. Definitely a purchase you won't regret!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed cosmetologist and barber with over 30 years of experience, I’m always on the lookout for unique fragrances. DedCool 01 Taunt Eau de Parfum caught my attention with its promise of a rich vanilla scent. Upon first spritz, the vanilla notes are incredibly strong and undeniably bold. While vanilla lovers might find this intoxicating, I found it a bit overpowering for my personal taste. The fragrance is long-lasting, which is a plus, but its intensity could be toned down a notch for those who prefer a subtler scent.  The overall composition is sophisticated, with a blend of undertones that slowly emerge, adding depth and complexity to the initial vanilla burst. It’s a fragrance that demands attention and leaves a lasting impression. Though not my go-to due to its potency, I appreciate its high quality and unique character. For those who adore a dominant vanilla aroma, DedCool 01 Taunt will undoubtedly become a staple in their collection.  While it’s a bit too strong for my everyday wear, I can see it being a perfect fit for evening outings or special occasions where you want your fragrance to make a statement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love fragrance and even though I hadn't tried DedCool previously, I was excited to try it. I absolutely love it! The packaging is simple yet unique and eye catching. It's the perfect combination of vanilla and amber with hints of berry as well. Taut lasted all day. I love that I can wear it to work and easily transition it for a night out. You can put it in your purse for on the go or keep it on your vanity. It's meant to be layered, but I found that I enjoyed it all on its own as well. This is perfect for anyone who loves vanilla, doesn't want anything that's heavy or overwhelming, and likes playing with layering fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Warm and inviting like a perfect summer day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Intrigued by it’s simplicity in its packaging design, I was surprised by its warm floral scent with notes of vegan vanilla, floral cassis, bergamot, amber and fresh dew. It is also unisex, layerable and long lasting lasting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion - Dedcool Fragrance 01 Taunt smells fantastic!!! It has a soft vanilla scent that is more potent than the bergamot and amber. Taunt is a perfume for any age—it reminds me of when I was a teenager but is elegant enough to wear as an adult. It is not too overpowering, even if you put a lot on. The scent lasts pretty well throughout the day, but I spray more later as it fades. I get whiffs of it here and there. I usually don't go for vanilla scents as I age, but I am digging this perfume! I love that Deadcool is genderless and vegan. One pump gives off a good amount of perfume in a fine mist. Can't wait to layer it with other dedcool scents and see what it smells like!  I will get this for my friend's daughter, who loves vanilla scents! Great fragrance for a teenager!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a few DedCool fragrances and this one has been my favorite by far! It’s warm and spicy and personally to me the scent is very comforting. Upon the initial spray I get that bergamot not with a hint of dew, the hint of few reminds me of bright spring mornings as a kid. It then transforms and I get this warm berry note, I’m guessing from the cassis, It kind of reminds me of a warm fruity pie as the base notes start to present. At the dry down stage the vanilla and amber take center stage but I still also get a hint of berries in the background which I love as berry notes are one of my favorites. The vanilla really warms up on my skin during the dry down and I’ve had a chance to layer it with some other fragrances I own and it’s such a great scent for layering! I can smell this for about 2-3 hours before it becomes more of a skin scent but I think it’s perfect for settings where you don’t want a overwhelming fragrance because I don’t think many people would find this scent offensive, it’s very pleasant!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance enthusiast I was super excited to try out this fragrance from Dedcool. I have been following the brand for a while and I love their mission to empower everyone to be able to express themselves through scent and has the planet in mind offering a non-toxic, biodegradable and vegan fragrance option. Dedcool is meant to be layered with other fragrances allowing the user to create their own custom blend. I personally really loved taunt over Dedcools other fragrance “Xtra Milk.” I love the confidence boost this fragrance gives me. This fragrance has a lovely, soft, vanilla note that is perfect for any occasion, day or night. A light spray on your neck or wrist is all that is needed for a tantalizing scent that lasts the whole day through.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who enjoys trying fragrances with unique scents, I was delighted to be trying this one out for myself.  I love how Dedcool's fragrances are unisex, and not steered towards one specific sex or gender. I like to try them on my honey as well, and they smell just as good on him as they do on me.  Also, DedCool fragrance are perfect for layering. For Taunt, I highly recommend you try it layered over their Xtra Milk fragrance, sometimes.  Taunt gives me Creamsicle Dreams vibes. On me, it smells like orange/citrus and vanilla, which is a combination that I absolutely adore. And, it lasts for a decent amount of time as well.  Lastly, let's discuss the packaging. Just as DedCool's fragrances as Unisex, so are the boxes and bottles. I love how simplistic their packaging is. There's no big butterflies or flowers or loud, gaudy neon letters here. Just simplistic, easy to read packaging.  I would highly recommend this fragrance to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion!  When I first received this product, I was super excited. The bottle itself is see-through and really simple. through the box, You could smell the fresh vanilla scent. I was on the lookout for a perfume that I could wear every day and it not be too harsh since I do have a baby. I really enjoy the vanilla scent on this perfume. If you’re looking for a clean perfume that isn’t too strong, I highly suggest one from this brand. the bottle is a glass bottle and it’s made really well. It also comes with a good amount of product. The only thing I didn’t like is that you do have a spray so often because it does wear off or maybe my nose is just used to the scent but that’s not a big deal. That’s the only reason why I gave it four stars. I never heard of unisex perfume, which makes this product stand out to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 33 year old beauty enthusiast, there is nothing better than the feeling smelling fresh throughout the day. The DedCool Frangrance 01 “Taunt” is absolutely heavenly! This scent is warm and alluring. I love how well the scent stands out yet it is not overpowering. The scent lasts well throughout the day and I find this appropriate for any occasion!  The notes of vanilla within this scent are defined and absolutely mesmerizing. If I could choose a scent for the rest of my life, this would be it. The scent easily spritzes from the bottle and a little bit of this perfume goes a long way. The packaging is simple yet unique. I recommend this scent to anyone looking for a universal scent that can adapt to any occasion. I find myself smelling my wrist throughout the day and falling in love with the scent all over again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a self-proclaimed vanilla lover, I was drawn to DedCool 01 Taunt Eau de Parfum. The description boasting vanilla notes promised a delightful scent experience, and I couldn't wait to try it!  Initially, DedCool 01 Taunt did not disappoint. The scent on my skin leaned more vanilla-forward, fulfilling my vanilla obsession—exactly what I craved! However, the fragrance offered an interesting twist.  Over time, the fragrance developed a strong floral note. While this wasn't unpleasant, it did overpower the vanilla scent I was enjoying. It seems my body chemistry amplifies the floral middle notes in the perfume. This is important to consider, especially for a fragrance marketed as unisex.  Here's a breakdown of what I found:  Vanilla: There's definitely vanilla, and it provides a beautiful initial impression, but it's not the star of the show throughout.  Floral (Middle Notes): The fragrance has strong floral middle notes that emerge over time.  Overall:  If you're looking for a long-lasting, purely vanilla perfume, DedCool 01 Taunt might not be the best choice. The fragrance transforms over time, with the vanilla fading and the floral middle notes taking center stage. This could be interesting for some, but for vanilla lovers like myself, it might be a bit disappointing. Additionally, the strong floral presence might be confusing for those seeking a truly unisex fragrance. (This review was collected as part of a promotion)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance lover since I was a tiny girl and as a beauty professional for almost 10 years, Ive tried a lot of fragrances! This one is so great for everyday! It’s not too heavy but it’s there! Reminds me a of a springy afternoon.  It layers well with other perfumes, especially the ones in the Dedcool Family. The bottle is minimalistic and beautiful. I love that all the bottles are uniform and look great upon my vanity.  This fragrance has a great vanilla scent and it’s fresh. But it’s also creamy. It kind of reminded me of an orange creamsicle.  It lasted a fair amount of time on me, I would say about 4-5 hours. I did spray 1-2 spritz’s, on wrists, inner elbows, neck, under bra area, back of knees and ankles. That seems to be my go to for my scents to last all day.  Overall I would recommend this scent!  Was given product in exchange for honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DEDCooL Fragrance 01 Taunt Eau De Parfum is a beautiful and captivating scent! Top notes are bergamot and fresh dew. The middle notes are floral notes and cassis. The base notes are vanilla and amber. The notes in this fragrance are perfectly balanced! It is a soft, creamy, warm vanilla scent with the perfect balance of sweetness and freshness. It’s not overpowering or too sweet. I love that this perfume is layerable, clean, and vegan. It's a wonderful unisex scent and can be worn for any occasion. I would wear this all year round. However, the sillage is very weak, and the lasting power is moderate. The bottle itself is beautiful and sleek. Overall, it’s a beautiful fragrance, and I would recommend it. I just wish the sillage and longevity were stronger. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool’s 01 “Taunt” is a warm, sheer fragrance that captures the essence of sophistication with a blend of citrusy bergamot, rich amber, and creamy vanilla. It’s a scent that feels both modern and timeless. I can definitely see anyone from any gender and generation wearing this perfume. The perfume has a smooth application and a lasting presence that subtly lingers throughout the day. It is very interesting to layer this perfume with others.  I’m a big fan of vanilla fragrances and the bergamot freshness was a cherry on top. I definitely recommend this perfume to anyone who is also like vanilla fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This review, gathered as part of a promotion, showcases Dedcools01 Taunt eau de parfum through a guy's perspective. I found myself captivated by its unique blend of vanilla, amber (my favorite) and floral notes, making it a versatile fragrance suitable for any season. The top note of bergamot provides a refreshing burst, while the heart note of vanilla adds sweetness and warmth, and the base note of amber offers a sensual depth. The fragrance strikes a perfect balance between freshness and warmth, with impressive longevity. Moreover, its formulation using high-quality, vegan, and cruelty-free ingredients, along with being genderless adds to its appeal, making it a standout choice for those seeking a distinctive and ethical fragrance option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool's Taunt is definitely a genderless fragrance and very well balanced. It's not a super bright citrus fragrance nor a super sweet vanilla. It's balanced somewhere in between where you can smell citrus but complimented by vanilla.  The fragrance starts off with a lovely citrusy bergamot and a creamy vanilla. And then comes the rich amber in the back. The fragrance develops really nicely over time. It is a really lovely fragrance I can see layered with other Dedcool products or another citrus or vanilla fragrance. However, I don't think this is one that works well on my skin. I greatly prefer smelling this on a smelling blotter or in a room as opposed to it on my arm. That being said, I still think its smell great and would recommend this for those you like vanilla but don't want something super sweet.

reviews.review_title: Dedcool, a fragrance that transcends traditional

reviews.review_text: Dedcool, a fragrance that transcends traditional boundaries, offers an olfactory experience that is as inclusive as it is captivating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My name is Crystal, I'm a beauty enthusiast. I'm the mother of four kids and I'm 47 years old. I just tried taunt and I was amazed by how wonderful it is. It smells amazing. I can't believe how well the vanilla and amber mix to make this warm and beautiful scent. Everywhere I've went and had it on I got tons of compliments. I love trying new scents and fragrances but I didn't expected it to be this appealing. I can wear it anywhere, anytime and it's warm, soft scent isn't offensive even to my friends that usually can't wear fragrances, nor I wear them around them. It has a beautiful light floral scent with a soft hint of warm vanilla and amber. It's just right to wear when I want to smell my best and boost my confidence a little bit. I'm so glad I tried taunt. I'll always keep a few bottles around now.

This review was collected as part of a promotion. I am a beauty enthusiast who loves fragrance. I’ve been using DedCool’s “01 Taunt” eau de parfum every day since I received it, and I’m obsessed with the fragrance. I didn’t love it when I first sprayed it, but after it dried down I realized it’s what I’ve been missing in my fragrance collection. The vanilla and amber blend together seamlessly, and the floral notes give the fragrance its own unique scent, different from any other fragrance I’ve tried. I really like that it doesn’t lean toward a particular season, but is a fragrance that is perfect for any season. I also love using it as a base layer to change the scents of other fragrances- it goes with anything. My advice is to make sure to give it a chance to dry down. Definitely a must have for any collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Dedcool's 01 Taunt eau de parfum daily since I received it, and I'm captivated by the cozy and warm atmosphere it creates. This fragrance exudes a sense of comfort and sophistication, making it suitable for anyone, regardless of gender. When my partner wore it to work, he received numerous compliments from curious colleagues. During my long shifts in the hospital ER, the scent lingers on, keeping me feeling fresh and confident throughout the day. The perfume's minimalist packaging adds to its allure, reflecting confidence and luxury in a simple yet elegant design. With top notes of bergamot and fresh dew, the fragrance gradually evolves into a warm, subtle vanilla scent. Its clean and vegan formulation allows it to be worn beautifully on its own or layered with other fragrances for a personalized touch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 50 year old beauty enthusiast. I work in a professional office setting and tend to seek out fragrances that are light, subtle, and not overpowering. Dedcool Fragrance #1 Taunt meets all of these requirements.  The combination of subtle notes of bergamont, vanilla, and amber create a very warm and alluring fragrance. The fragrance is not sweet as one might expect with vanilla notes, and these scents blend so well together that one does not overpower the other. Typically I do not wear floral scents, but the floral notes of Dedcool Taunt are not strong enough to deter me from use. I love that the scent is light enough to be buildable with other fragrances. I appreciate that it can be sprayed on either clothing or my skin. The glass bottle is a nice touch and is the perfect size to pop in your purse or travel bag.  Being a genderless scent, it can be used by anyone in my family who wants to smell great for a special occasion, yet it is light enough for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Before I tried Dedcool set perfume and I enjoyed it then I had a chance again to try new perfume scent which is this Dedcool Genderless-Vegan and I must say it never disappoint me. This perfume did an amazing job creating perfume oils and did a huge hit with me. I love the purity of the ingredients and I could wear this scents anytime of the day or night. I used it after I take shower and its fragrance stays for the whole day. It isn’t over-powering and it doesn’t give me a headache like most perfumes. My daugther who is 5 years old loved its scent also and she always told me that she likes my perfume. I will definitely recommend this Dedcool perfume to all ages especially if you are looking for long lasting scents and my husband also used for a week now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool Fragrance Number 01, Taunt is a captivating fragrance that combines notes of bergamot, vanilla, and amber to create a unique and alluring scent profile. The blend of these three key notes results in a fragrance that is both fresh and warm, making it suitable for a wide range of occasions and preferences. The top note of bergamot adds a citrusy and refreshing element to the fragrance, providing an initial burst of energy and brightness. This is complemented by the heart note of vanilla, which adds a sweet and creamy undertone to the scent, creating a sense of warmth and comfort. The base note of amber adds a rich and sensual depth to the fragrance, giving it a sophisticated and long-lasting finish. I love its unique and complex scent profile, it strikes a perfect balance between freshness and warmth. The longevity of the fragrance is also highlighted, the scent lingers on the skin throughout the day without being overpowering. Furthermore, Dedcool Fragrance Number 01, Taunt is crafted using high-quality, vegan, and cruelty-free ingredients. In conclusion, Dedcool Fragrance Number 01, Taunt is a well-crafted and versatile fragrance that offers a sophisticated blend of bergamot, vanilla, and amber. Its unique scent profile, longevity, and ethical formulation make it a standout choice for individuals looking for a distinctive and high-quality fragrance option. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed; TAUNT is intoxicating, sophisticated, warm & inviting - an alluring aromatic composition of creamy vanilla playfully lingers with a light floral freshness, hints of citrus mingle with barely there bergamot for a refreshing contrast rounded out by a slightly spicy amber undertone.   Im very impressed with its staying power, it’s substantial but not overwhelming. Fully recyclable and made with clean ingredients, this versatile product is packaged in a glass bottle with a minimalist design. When I wear this illuminating fragrance it gives me a quiet confidence, a comfortable yet flirtatious feeling of anticipation and unlimited possibilities.   A truly unique universe scent with moderate projection makes it extremely versatile. perfect for daily wear or save for special occasions.. it is office friendly & date night approved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hi! my name is Andrea. I am a beauty enthusiast and a collector of perfumes. I have a wonderful collection with a variety of fragrances, and I was super excited to have the opportunity to try Dedcool Taunt.  I must mention the packaging is very elegant.  I love that this perfume is new, innovative, inclusive, clean, vegan, and genderless.  Dedcool no.1 Taunt opens with a burst of notes like bergamot, vanilla and amber that is supple and not too overwhelming which makes a perfect balance for any gender so even though it's floral it's not too floral and over powering.  This fragrance is long-lasting and lingers throughout the day.  It's a wonderful scent and can be worn by anygender and for any occasion whether it's for professional work like in a office where they are other people and you don't want a scent that it too overwhelming or whether you're going on a evening date this is the perfect perfume it traditions really well.  My husband and I both absolutely love Dedcool Taunt and highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool Taunt's Bergamot, Vanilla, and Amber composition is as unique as it is wearable. This scent captures the essence of a freshly showered, clean feeling that instantly transports me to an idyllic Italian beach stroll. The initial burst of Bergamot is invigorating, evoking a sense of freshness and clarity. As it settles, the warm, comforting notes of Vanilla and Amber emerge, creating a beautifully balanced fragrance that feels both sophisticated and inviting.  One of the standout aspects of Dedcool Taunt is its projection. It has a moderate sillage that is noticeable without being overpowering, making it perfect for both professional settings or casual gatherings. The lasting power is impressive; it lingers on my skin for hours, gradually evolving and maintaining its presence throughout the day.  Wearing Dedcool Taunt feels like wrapping yourself in a soft, luxurious embrace. It's a versatile fragrance suitable for various occasions, from a relaxed weekend brunch to a date night out. Its fresh yet warm profile makes it a great choice year-round, whether I’m enjoying a summer day by the sea or a cozy winter evening by the fire. Dedcool Taunt effortlessly enhances any moment, making me feel both vibrant and cozy.  I love that clean ingredients are used and I find it to be a perfectly unisex scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the Dedcool 01 Taunt EDP. When I first applied this  perfume I put it on my pulse points and let it dry down before I smelled it. This is a beautiful scent, it reminds me of going on a romantic date. It’s alluring, mysterious and sensual. Being a Licensed Esthetician and retail specialist for 22+ years I have tested and been educated on the different scents and notes of perfume. The top notes of this scent are Bergamot and Fresh Dew, the middle notes are Floral and Cassis with the bottom notes of Vanilla and Amber. I like this so much because Vanilla, Amber and Bergamot are some of my favorite scents. Another great thing about this perfume is that it is genderless and vegan so everyone can wear it. I would definitely recommend Dedcool 01 Taunt EDP to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, this isn't your typical vanilla fragrance. Don't get me wrong, the vanilla is definitely there – warm and creamy, but not overpowering. It's balanced by this citrusy bergamot that adds a surprising freshness. Then there's this subtle fresh dew note that I can't quite place, but it keeps the scent from getting too sweet. Dedcool describes Taunt as an emulation of breaking out of your boyish phase, and I kinda get it. It's definitely feminine, but in a confident, playful way. It's more coming-of-age story than sugary sweetness. I'm happy that Taunt lasts a good while on my skin. I can still catch whiffs of it throughout the day. Bonus: It's vegan, cruelty-free, and all that good stuff. Love the scent and the confidence boost it gives me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle itself is sleek and modern, with a minimalist aesthetic that I really love. The matte black glass gives it a luxurious, high-end look and feel. V The spray nozzle is fantastic - it dispenses the perfect amount of fragrance with each press. The mist is fine and even, so you get an even coverage without any wasteful drips or overspray. 08 I also appreciate how the spray has a good amount of power behind it, allowing the fragrance to project nicely without being overpowering. It's the ideal balance between a delicate mist and a robust spritz. DedCool Fragrance Number 01 has a unique blend of notes that creates a captivating scent. It's a harmonious mix of fresh citrus, warm vanilla, and a hint of musk. The result is a fragrance that is both invigorating and comforting. I love how long-lasting this fragrance is. Just a few spritzes in the morning and I can still catch whiffs of it throughout the day. It's the perfect balance between subtle and noticeable. & Overall, DedCool Fragrance Number 01 is a must-try for anyone looking for a genderless and vegan fragrance that's both sophisticated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dedcool Fragrance 01 Taunt is very subtle, neither too floral nor too bold and holds true to its claim of being a generless scent. Definitely works as an everyday wear.   One of the highlights is its impressive longevity. A few sprays in the morning last throughout the day, maintaining a consistent presence without overwhelming the senses. The projection is moderate, making it ideal for both personal enjoyment and creating a pleasant aura in social settings.  This fragrance is remarkably versatile, suitable for any occasion. Its balanced composition makes it perfect for daily wear, while its sophisticated undertones ensure it transitions seamlessly to evening events. Whether you're heading to a business meeting, a casual brunch, or a formal dinner, Dedcool Fragrance No. 1 is an excellent choice.

I will wear this often, and I think it goes well with either winter or summer seasons.  I think this perfume goes well on its own and can be layered as well with other scents as well.
