reviews.review_text: Dedcool is known for their genderless fragrances and simple yet classy bottle designs. I have never met a dedcool scent I didn’t like. Taunt is described as using bergamot, vanilla and amber notes. This scent isn’t overpowering at all no matter how many times you spray it. It has this subtle yet beautiful dry down where you really can smell the vanilla. I love that is isn’t an overly sweet vanilla, so you can layer it with other scents perfectly. I can’t stop smelling myself as I am writing this, this is definitely one of my new favorite scents. A lot of my fragrances I like to coordinate seasonally with the weather but this one can be worn at anytime in my opinion, it really is a universal, genderless and amazing fragrance that I could not be happier with !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fragrance plays an integral role in my life, especially as a professional writer. Nothing sparks my creativity like a juicy waft of citrus or a warm hint of vanilla. Even though I wear a variety of fragrances, gourmand scents predominate my collection. Dedcool’s “Taunt” is an easy choice for me on warm days because the vanilla doesn’t skew toward the candied spectrum. The floral notes ground this scent, so you won’t smell like pastry or crave sweets.   I would characterize Taunt as a light-to-medium scent with minimal staying power. This is something you’ll need to refresh after a few hours, or, if you like layering your scents, this also plays nicely with more floral-dominant fragrances. For my needs, I apply an unscented body oil after my shower and then spritz Taunt on my neck and wrists. This helps the longevity without disturbing the scent.   Closing Thought: If you haven’t found your perfect vanilla, give Taunt a try. It’s easy to wear no matter what your age and has a sophisticated amber base note that adds to the creamy scent.

reviews.review_title: A wondrously Unique, yet subtle fragrance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge lover of all great smelling things in life. Fragrance is a passion of mine, as well as telling about my experiences with them. Taunt by Dedcool instantly became my favorite the moment I smelled it. A gloriously clean and billowing soft vanilla flower atop bergamot and amber fields. I am instantly sent beyond the clouds into raindrops of golden sweet vanilla, atop a delicate and long lasting crystal kingdom of light and sparkling gold. A bit of the dramatic to describe how I feel once this domed, plain, glass bottle atomizes its beauty into my skin, and heart. This fragrance is anything but overwhelming, yet it lasts for more than a sunrise. I often pair it with XtraMilk or wear it on its own.. but it can be paired beautifully with several other types of fragrances. I recommend this as a human who loves fragrances from all spectrums, and I say yes, yes, yes, a million times yes that you should absolutely smell this or try it on yourself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this dedcool taunt  perfume for my honest review !  As a beauty enthusiast I spend a lot of time testing out and discovering all different kinds of beauty products . It is what makes me happy . It’s my passion .  I have tried out all of the main dedcool scents , I didn’t get to try out any of the limited edition collections  or discontinued scents but all the currents .  Taunt is by far my most favorite from the brand . I think of pheromone scents and this comes to mind . For me , I can’t exactly pick up the vanilla or amber notes but it smells amazing. This is - your skin but better Mixed with a clean white t shirt - type of scent . I believe it would be perfect for both males and females . It can be layered nicely with a wide range of other scents . It lasts almost all day on me  as well .  I’ve seen some commenters mention the oiliness , and yes it’s fairly oily but that’s just because the concentration is higher than your average perfume, much closer to a perfume oil . You can easily fix it by just dabbing it into your skin to prevent build up or it staining your clothes . If I was to compare it to another scent , I think lake and sky 11 11 is probably the closest . Or bath and body works ivory cashmere  spray .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

The fragrance feels rich, warm, and delectably inviting, enveloping you in a comforting embrace. While it certainly has a sweet depth that leans towards the feminine, its complexity and elegance make it suitable for anyone who is bold enough to wear it. This is a scent I would choose for a first date when I want to make a lasting impression. It has a remarkable staying power, lingering in the room long after you've left without being overpowering. There's a subtle, enchanting quality to it that ensures you'll be remembered. The fragrance has a soothing effect on my soul, evoking a sense of calm and confidence that lasts throughout the day. It's more than just a perfume; it's an experience that wraps you in a sensual aura, making you feel both alluring and comforted. Whether you're looking to make a statement or simply want to feel enveloped in luxury, this fragrance is a perfect choice.   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_text: I love vegan perfumes and I had an eye on this on since a few months now. It is a unisex perfume so both men and women can use it. It has a very sharp and strong smell so I would say itis close to male fragrances. It has notes of amber and white musk. It does last for a long time that is one thing I loved about it. I had multiple people ask me about this scent upon wearing it. Even before opening the bottle i could smell the perfume as the smell was so strong. It seems to be from the warm and spicy fragrance family. I really like the packaging and the simple design of the scent bottle too. The scent is warm and clean and very unique not like most of the scents I have used. These bottles are recyclable and are made from glass that is so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk perfume is a divine scent experience that epitomizes natural elegance. Its captivating aroma strikes the perfect balance between sophistication and subtlety, making it an ideal choice for any occasion. Just a small amount of this fragrance goes a long way, enveloping you in a delicate yet enchanting aura that lasts throughout the day. Unlike overpowering scents, DedCool Xtra Milk is refreshingly light, leaving behind a trail of freshness without overwhelming your senses. Its unique blend evokes a sense of purity and refinement, drawing compliments wherever you go. Packaged in a charming glass bottle, its clear presentation adds to its allure, making it a must-have addition to your fragrance collection.You want regret go buy today !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Starting off with Fragrance 01 Taunt, when you first spray you are greeted with the top notes of amber very strong and masculine. Then as the heart and base notes kick in you are wrapped in bergamot with hints of vanilla making this scent feel warm and inviting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am basing the review off of a sample I received around the holidays. I received this one and the fragrance milk. This one is called “Taunt” but the vial says Fragrance No 1. Fragrance is subjective and different on everyone. To me, this smells strongly of a stale cigarette tray, like the tin ones that used to sit out at McDonalds back when you could smoke in restaurants. I get none of the notes mentioned on the scent profile at all. It’s maybe sort of Off bug spray and Pledge. Worse, it’s like “tastable”. Did you ever have a fragrance that you can actually “taste”, but not in a good cherry cheesecake kind of way, but in a bad, irritating the back of your throat kind of way. I’m not a social media follower, but I understand based on other comments this must be getting a lot of advertising by different “influencers”. Remember that these people are paid by companies and sent free stuff to talk up their products so take everything you hear and see online with a grain of salt. Don’t get me wrong because I’ve discovered a lot of genuinely great things from ads, but this shouldn’t be a blind buy. Try to test in a store or get a sample first. Fortunately, I didn’t have to wash it off because I covered it up with the fragrance milk (it’s a much better scent), BUT both faded super quickly. Within 30 minutes, poof - gone.
I love this so much  Smells like clean sheets and skin  The vanilla is super discreet and the right amount of sweetness. The only thing is that it doesn’t last as long as I would like but still good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Reminds me of Victorias Secret Scandalous perfume, love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the weirdest perfumes I’ve ever smelled. I blind bought it because of the rave reviews and the fact that it’s trending everywhere. This literally smells like citrus cleaning products mixed with bug spray. I tried to let it sit on my skin and see if maybe it would smell better once settled, but I had to SCRUB it off of my arm. Maybe I got a bad batch?

reviews.review_title: Smells like you just took a shower
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells kinda like the Amika hair care products. It just smells like that girl that smells clean and freshly showered, but not in a sharp crisp chemical way, in more of a warm soapy vanilla amber way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unsure how I feel about this one. I bought it on a whim after loving a sample of dedcool milk and buying a full size bottle of that along with a travel spray of taunt. It kind of reminds me of a very artificial fruity smell. Almost like a cleaning product? Due to the longer shipping from deecool’s website, I’m going to let it settle for a few more days to really decide but as of now I am really disappointed after all of the positive reviews I saw.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a decent-sized sample in one of my recent purchases. I was very excited because I had been wanting to try DedCool fragrances ever since Allie Glines mentioned this brand.  Unfortunately, it is not long-lasting & to be honest I can't even explain what this smells like. It smells good upon initial spray but no specific notes stand out to me.  Its a light & pleasant floral fragrance with some citrus but that's it.  It kind of reminds me of a body spray.  I will continue to use my sample; I'm sure body chemistry has a lot to do with this. I am still open to try other DedCool scents.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love, but I do not
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to get this delivered after had sniffing the detergent at a popular place in LA. I was immediately in love with the scent. I just sprayed it on my wrists and it smells like the nicely scented Raid for Ants. Def returning :(

reviews.review_title: This is the scent I was searching for.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my everyday scent. When you wear this people don’t say “I like your perfume,” they say “you smell good” and that’s what I’m after. Very close to skin (also what I’m after- you should only smell me if you’re right next to me) but lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Smells pretty good, it's not overwhelming and gives a nice hint of vanilla. I wouldn't say it's very sweet as it is a pretty gender neutral scent. A good smell but not my cup of tea!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I have a very sensitive nose and so does my Mom but when she smells this on me she always compliments ! It's androgynous, sexy, and cozy. Like getting a hug from someone you haven't seen in awhile that you trust a lot. I will 100% buy the full size once I run out of the tester! Also for the lasting power, I smell it on me all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

When I smelled this, I immediately thought if I was turned into a perfume, this would be my scent. It's a perfect mix of musk, cool toned scents, but with a hint of sweet and fruit. It's hard to describe, but I think anyone could love this scent.

But it seems totally random whether you’ll receive one version or the other. Really annoying.

It’s perfect for layering and if you just want to wear it alone. The notes aren’t too overpowering and I really love that. I would definitely recommend for a gift during this holiday season!!

I got the full size and now I want to travel size so I can keep it in my bag when I am on the go. If you like 7 Virtues Vanilla Wood or Killian Love Don' Be Shy, you will love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m usually a citrus scent girl and just started getting into sweeter scents as well. This is a smooth blend of bergamot and vanilla. It doesn’t have super potent projection or lasting power, but it’s a nice everyday scent that makes you feel good when you smell yourself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this perfume. I am not so much a fruity scent girl. A lot of perfumes turn me off. One scent I always come back to is vanilla and this is the perfect vanilla perfume for a fellow vanilla lover. It’s most definitely an everyday kind of perfume. It means the “clean girl aesthetic.” I’d give this 12 stars if I could 😊

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review and I went with Dedcool because I wanted to try something new! I love the packaging/branding. The scent is so refreshing and sweet. Not super strong, so it’s definitely a fragrance I’ve been wearing everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review DedCool's Taunt in 1.7oz. I wanted to try a fragrance that layers well with the other scents that I have. First of all, I love the packaging! The scent itself is rejuvenating and fresh. It has notes of Bergamont, Vanilla, and citrus which I liked considering I am not one to jump on vanilla scents very often. I also like that this perfume is genderless, not toxic, and vegan. Whenever I spray this, it instantly reminds me of a warmth, freshness, and a soft gently vibe. This scent is versatile and like I said can layer with another scent. I will definitely try the other scents from this brand. It's a great everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love changing up my perfumes depending on the season. For spring, I choose something sweet and floral; for the summer, I opt for clean and citrusy scents. When it gets cooler outside, I love to wear cozy, warm fragrances like Taunt 01.  Taunt 01 is such an unusual scent; it transitions from a juicy, fresh bergamot and dewdrop to a warm and sensual combination of vanilla and amber. I don't even have enough words to describe it, but I can describe the feeling.  It's like getting cozy under a cool blanket and slowly warming up, like a big hug on a rainy day. That's how the air smells after a light rain, when it's still warm outside.  *Gifted by Sephora*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All I can smell is a health food store vanilla and a little lemon on top. Actually smells a bit like a kuumba made roll on vanilla I used to have, which really isn’t bad just a bit cloying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is their BEST fragrance! Strong but Subtle. It is a very dreamy vanilla scent. Extremely heavenly! Perfect daily scent

I wish this perfume was stronger but because it’s not I tend to wear it as a bedtime or work scent. I have over 30 perfumes in my collection and this one is my favorite. Vanilla is my jam, there’s also amber and bergamot in here but I smell more. It’s warm but there’s a coolness to it, I looked at the ingredients on the back of my box and it says there’s also cucumber, tea, and marshmallow notes in here. I don’t know why they wouldn’t list that bc it makes it seem much more interesting in my opinion. It’s a gourmand but not too sweet, definitely unisex. Very addictive, I’m on my second bottle of this. I have the lotion but it’s not that strong either. Gotta be playing it cool when you wear this bc no matter how much you spray it’ll only last a couple hours. Even though the longevity bothers me, I’ll always repurchase this fragrance for the amazing unique smell.

I do wish it had more staying power but I have yet to try the new improved version that’s supposed to be stronger so I’m super excited to try that one. I always like to know when reading reviews what the perfume smells like to people and this smell like earl grey tea to me. It’s so dreamy and delicious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: I was enchanted to meet you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Taunt has swept me off my feet with its irresistible blend of scents. It's my love potion number 9. From the flirtatious whispers of bergamot and fresh dew to the seductive embrace of floral and cassis, you’d think I work on a flower farm. And let's not forget the vanilla and amber base notes that make me feel like a confident, delicious cupcake. I'm head over heels for this perfume—it's the only thing I need to conquer the world (and smell amazing while doing it)!
Smells like waking up from a daydream. If soft, creamy scents are your thing, you'll love this.

It is a nice scent, its clean and airy, but reminds me a bit too much of Skin by Reserve, which I am not the biggest fan of. Someone said it reminds them a bit of baby wipes and I can totally see that. I wish there was a a bit more emphasis on the vanilla note. It also has no projection on me and the scent disappears within the minute, which is the only reason I would not recommend as scent is subjective. Forget layering as any perfume covers this scent up (atleast on me). I love cool vanillas so this was a bit of a let down.

It's very warm and sweet smelling, I almost get like a grape or black currant syrup smell which is nice and feminine. The smell lingers for a few hours but doesn't have much reach. I suggest one or two sprays at most because it can be overpowering if you apply too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great “clean girl” vanilla. Similar vibes to Clean Reserve Skin and Glossier You. Not a gourmand vanilla so it’s unique in my collection. Upgraded to a full size, will be beautiful for spring! Highly recommend

reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this travel perfume and it is very convenient since it’s on the go! Amazing!!

reviews.review_text: This is the best smelling and unique fragrance I’ve come across in a long time! It’s perfectly vanilla, but also fresh and mature. It’s also great for layer because it is a softer scent!

reviews.review_title: Would wear this on a first date
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so good!!! It’s an identical scent to Stella by Tocca and its cheaper ;) Although Taunt in more rounded while Stella is more sharper to the nose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did Aphrodite just walk into the room? Oh no, that's just me in Taunt by DedCool. This scent immediately casts a love spell on anyone in your presence. Make sure to pair with long nails to protect yourself from all your new fans who won't leave you alone because you smell like heaven.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best perfume on the market! Love the smell; clean and fresh. Not an overwhelming smell, just perfect.
I love this perfume - and so do all my friends! People even stop me on the street to ask me what I'm wearing. So good, not too strong, just perfect. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably my favorite fragrance to exist. It is perfect for every seasonal, affordable, and the perfect size. I've gone through 3 samples already!!!
Love this perfume - good everyday wear and a staple in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Smells very clean and soft. I get lots of compliments on this. Took off one star because it has bad longevity. I would say I get a good 1-1.5 hours before I can’t smell it and neither can those around me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this based on the notes and other peoples reviews but unfortunately I was disappointed. I smelled no vanilla in this at all. It reminds me a lot of that aquatic Mac perfume. It was a past for me￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent. To me it smells similar to Byredo’s Gypsy Water. Light, close to skin, delightful. Recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This took a few days for me to really fall in love with. The bergamot is very strong at first but calms down within the first 10 mins into this dreamy yummy creamsicle smell with an earthy undertone. It’s youthful and playful but the earthy undertone gives it a grown up feel at the same time.

reviews.review_title: A cozy warm inviting slightly masculine vanilla !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh. I love this scent so much. I was looking for a skin scent that leans vanilla and this is it. It’s warm and cozy and the only thing I’m gonna wear in the fall. I may get a full size to wear it to bed because it’s so cozy. It’s not super sweet and sugary. It’s almost slightly masculine and I love that. It doesn’t project but I don’t think it’s intended to. I’d call this a masculine vanilla. That sounds weird but coming from someone who leans towards gourmands, fruity florals, and anything with vanilla, I loved this so much.

reviews.review_title: Smells like Lake by Rosie Jane, but lasts longer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells just like Lake by Rosie Jane, but lasts so much longer. Love the smell, it’s super chill and has an awesome balance of bergamot and vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Taunt has been my go to scent lately. For anyone who liked vanilla scents growing up you'll love this. It's the grown up, sexy version of the vanilla body spray i used as a little girl. Its creamy, a bit musky and so lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this after trying the Dedcool sampler pack and it has become my go-to fragrance! Perfect for every day, and I get so many compliments every time I wear it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very clean, can't go wrong with this perfume! It was a blind buy, so I went off of the 'scent notes', can't exactly say they described it accurately but it does smells very clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the scent, but there is no staying power for me so I wouldn’t repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this it is unique but still easy to were. i put it on today because I have a cold and it is so cozy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy but I thought it was a safe pick considering I love all the notes listed… sigh wellll it smells like a cheap vanilla body spray I would get from the drugstore and it lasts maybe an hour tops? So disappointed. This scent is definitely overhyped… will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: when i say it's a must have.. this is a MUST HAVE! Taunt has such a calm, vanilla smell to it that I love spraying it all over my pillow case because I just love going to bed smelling it. This is definitely my signature every day scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love wearing this alone or layering it with their milk fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for several days, I wondered if it wasn't actually a parfum but a hair scent.  I can't say I like or dislike the scent because I can't smell it.  Don't waist your money on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance! It smells so good. I only ordered the travel size but will be ordering the larger one next order!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty I got the sample set but this one is my favorite only issue is longevity but love it so much

reviews.review_title: The best non irritating and unique fragrance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely the best scent!!! It’s such a unique and understated but impactful scent!! Kinda sad it’s now on Sephora because it means that more people will know about it and it was such a hidden gem before.

reviews.review_title: My whole closet smells like taunt now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My whole closet smells like taunt now and I love it. Taunt is a staple and my fave dedcool sent

reviews.review_title: Obsessed doesn't even begin to cover it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect vanilla fragrance. Not overbearingly sweet, but delicious and warm. Has great staying power, and lingers to clothing in the best way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the travel size scent unsmelled directly from Dedcool, but I'm definitely purchasing the full size when I'm finished with it. I do not like vanilla fragrances, but I've been searching for a warmer scent that lasts longer than my usual citrusy perfumes. This is sweet without being annoying, has a hint of freshness, and overall just smells cozy. Like you smell good, but not like perfume. It reminds me a little bit of the hot topic perfumes from the 2000s (specifically the nightmare before christmas Sally perfume) in the best way. I'm so happy this scent exists.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a mix of creamy and green. Sweet and earthy. I am a fan of vanilla fragrances and this one doesn’t disappoint.  For those who think vanilla is too sweet, this is the perfect one to try since it sits close to the skin and becomes fresh and earthy. I would have given this five stars, but I wish the scent projected more. This is prettiest one in the Dedcool  line. Worth the purchase.
perfect for daily use and on the go perfume! i love all their scents and the company’s clean beauty initiative :)))

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very fresh vanilla and amber perfume, and some floral.  I LOVE it.  I have been wanting a vanilla perfume for a while, but vanilla is tricky.  It can often become too musky and smell like BO. Not this one.  This is the one you want.  I blind bought and was not disappointed.  It lasts all day but is not strong or overwhelming.  It's perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: one of my fave scents. I am normally not a fan of sweet scents but the vanilla here is balanced by warm cozy musk that makes it well balanced for my taste. For me this lasts most of the day, and is a go-to for any season/occasion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use Taunt layered with Milk (although it smells amazing along too!) and get so many compliments - friends, coworkers, even strangers! It’s the perfect amount of warm and sweet while still sultry. The perfect scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m constantly traveling and I always neglect to bring my perfume with. But after trying Taunt, I can’t go anywhere without it — dinner parties, work, vacations, and so on. Definitely will purchase again :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am OBSESSED with Taunt! It’s sexy, addictive, and I always get compliments. I would describe it as warm, ambery, and subtly sweet. Highly recommend it if you want something to turn heads that no one has smelled before!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is a 10/10. I get compliments every time I wear it out. Also,I am literally obsessed with all dedcool products. It makes for a great gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Words cannot express how much I adore this scent. It’s an all year kinda scent, cold and chilly? BOOM taunt! Warm and humid? BOOM TAUNT AGAIN! Anything you need taunt will deliver. Like a more refined and grown up fruit loop scent that’s not too sweet whatsoever, i love you taunt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is my all time favorite.  From the moment I first put it on, I always feel good and know I smell great.  The whole DedCool line is incredible; the laundry detergent is a must for everyone.   Thanks Sephora for carrying the coolest lifestyle brand ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Taunt was my first full size bottle purchase from DedCool and one of my most used perfumes in my collection. This scent is a warm vanilla/amber scent that is incredibly creamy but not overly sweet or heavy. Truly can work year around (and I live in SoCal so you know it gets hot). Taunt also layers well with Madonna Lilly if you’re into laying perfumes, but performs so well on its own. As someone who owns probably a more than necessary amount of perfumes, this perfume will always be in my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best Fragrance ever, I use this everyday. It is a must purchase
My favorite scent from Dedcool! It is super long lasting too :) You just need to spray once or twice and it will stay on for the whole night. Perfect for an everyday scent
First time buying a product from Dedcool and i’m absolutely OBSESSED! 10/10 would recommend. I will definitely be buying more products from Dedcool!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I discovered this scent about a year ago and I never looked back. I even have the air freshener for the car and the fragrance oil ( the oil is available on their website). This is one of the very few fragrances that doesn’t give me a headache. It’s a great vanilla scent because it not sickly sweet. It smells lovely you need to try it . I’m ordering a new bottle because I ran out of mine .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best scent ever!  Truly so refreshing and great quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite scent but it’s even better in this form because I can bring it in my purse everywhere I go. I also sometimes layer this with the other fragrance milk and it’s the best smell ever. I seriously have never gotten this many compliments before

reviews.review_title: Best smell ever! works for ppl w/ sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best fragrance.  First of all it’s literally the best scent ever.  Second of all, usually fragrance gives me hives and this is the first one that doesn’t!! Amazing and can’t recommend enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: fragrances are usually too overwhelming for me, some make me feel nauseous. but TAUNT…… she does wonders. the perfect everyday fragrance and one of my favs to layer with for a little subtle sweetness with any other scent i’m feeling for the day 0:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favorite scents! Both warm and cozy, yet fresh. Absolutely perfect everyday scent-- I never get sick of it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Taunt is the perfect everyday scent. I walk out of the house everyday with an extra boost of confidence. Pure perfection.
